title: Maximum Subarray Sum
algorithmDescription: Find maximum sum of contiguous subarray using Kadane's algorithm
detailedDescription: Find maximum sum of any contiguous subarray. Input: First line has n. Second line has n integers (may be negative). Output: Maximum subarray sum. Use Kadane's algorithm for O(n) solution. Handle all-negative arrays.
hints: Kadane's algorithm: track current sum and max sum
Add current element to current sum
If current sum < 0, reset to 0 (or current element)
Update max sum at each step
solutionApproach: Initialize maxSum and currentSum to first element. For each element: currentSum = max(element, currentSum + element). Update maxSum = max(maxSum, currentSum). Return maxSum.
testCaseCriteria: Must achieve O(n) time. Should handle all-negative arrays, single element, and mixed positive/negative.
